Patrick Stewart (born ) is an American former college football coach. He was the head football coach for Western State University—now known as Western Colorado University—from 2006 to 2010, Land o' Lakes High School from 2012 to 2014, and Lindenwood University – Belleville from 2018 until the program was disbanded in the spring of 2019. He also coached for Northern Colorado, Port Charlotte High School, Olivet, Nebraska–Kearney, Seton Hill, and Lindenwood. He played college football for Western State as a linebacker.
